verses.verse: שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Listen אִיִּים֙ <S%H339><s%> O isles אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> and to וְהַקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> unto me and hearken לְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> ye people מֵרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִבֶּ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> me from the womb קְרָאָ֔נִי <S%H7121><s%> hath called מִמְּעֵ֥י <S%H4578><s%> from the bowels אִמִּ֖י <S%H517><s%> of my mother הִזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> hath he made mention שְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> of my name

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he hath made פִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> my mouth כְּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword חַדָּ֔ה <S%H2299><s%> like a sharp בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> in the shadow יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> of his hand הֶחְבִּיאָ֑נִי <S%H2244><s%> hath he hid וַיְשִׂימֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H7760><s%> me and made לְחֵ֣ץ <S%H2671><s%> shaft בָּר֔וּר <S%H1305><s%> me a polished בְּאַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <S%H827><s%> in his quiver הִסְתִּירָֽנִי׃ <S%H5641><s%> hath he hid

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said לִ֖י עַבְדִּי־ <S%H5650><s%> unto me Thou [art] my servant אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you יִשְׂרָאֵ֕ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whom בְּךָ֖ אֶתְפָּאָֽר׃ <S%H6286><s%> in whom I will be glorified

וַאֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> Then I said לְרִ֣יק <S%H7385><s%> in vain יָגַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3021><s%> I have laboured לְתֹ֥הוּ <S%H8414><s%> for nought וְהֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> and in vain כֹּחִ֣י <S%H3581><s%> my strength כִלֵּ֑יתִי <S%H3615><s%> I have spent אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> [yet] surely מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <S%H4941><s%> my judgment אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> is with יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] with the LORD וּפְעֻלָּתִ֖י <S%H6468><s%> and my work אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> with my God

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> and now אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And now saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God יֹצְרִ֤י <S%H3335><s%> that formed מִבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <S%H990><s%> me from the womb לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> [to be] his servant ל֔וֹ לְשׁוֹבֵ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> again יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> to him Though Israel [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) יֵאָסֵ֑ף <S%H622><s%> be not gathered וְאֶכָּבֵד֙ <S%H3513><s%> yet shall I be glorious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וֵאלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> and my God הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֻזִּֽי׃ <S%H5797><s%> shall be my strength

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said נָקֵ֨ל <S%H7043><s%> It is a light thing מִֽהְיוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H1961><s%> may reach לִי֙ עֶ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> that thou shouldest be my servant לְהָקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> to raise up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> the tribes יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob [וּנְצִירֵי כ] (וּנְצוּרֵ֥י <S%H5336><s%> preserved ק) יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְהָשִׁ֑יב <S%H7725><s%> and to restore וּנְתַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5414><s%> I will also give לְא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> thee for a light גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> to the Gentiles לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> may reach יְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <S%H3444><s%> that thou mayest be my salvation עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> unto the end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth ס

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גֹּאֵ֨ל <S%H1350><s%> the Redeemer יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel קְדוֹשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6918><s%> [and] his Holy One לִבְזֹה־ <S%H960><s%> despiseth נֶ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> to him whom man לִמְתָ֤עֵֽב <S%H8581><s%> abhorreth גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> to him whom the nation לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> to a servant מֹשְׁלִ֔ים <S%H4910><s%> of rulers מְלָכִים֙ <S%H4428><s%> Kings יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see וָקָ֔מוּ <S%H6965><s%> and arise שָׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> princes וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֑וּ <S%H7812><s%> also shall worship לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> Because יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> because of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נֶאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> that is faithful קְדֹ֥שׁ <S%H6918><s%> [and] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּבְחָרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H977><s%> and he shall choose

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> time רָצוֹן֙ <S%H7522><s%> In an acceptable עֲנִיתִ֔יךָ <S%H6030><s%> have I heard וּבְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee and in a day יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H3444><s%> of salvation עֲזַרְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H5826><s%> have I helped וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <S%H5341><s%> thee and I will preserve וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֙ <S%H5414><s%> thee and give לִבְרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> thee for a covenant עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לְהָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> to establish אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth לְהַנְחִ֖יל <S%H5157><s%> to cause to inherit נְחָל֥וֹת <S%H5159><s%> heritages שֹׁמֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8074><s%> the desolate

לֵאמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> That thou mayest say לַֽאֲסוּרִים֙ <S%H631><s%> to the prisoners צֵ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> Go forth לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after בַּחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> to them that [are] in darkness הִגָּל֑וּ <S%H1540><s%> Shew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Along דְּרָכִ֣ים <S%H1870><s%> in the ways יִרְע֔וּ <S%H7462><s%> yourselves They shall feed וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁפָיִ֖ים <S%H8205><s%> [shall be] in all high places מַרְעִיתָֽם׃ <S%H4830><s%> and their pastures

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִרְעָ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7456><s%> They shall not hunger וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִצְמָ֔אוּ <S%H6770><s%> nor thirst וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> smite שָׁרָ֖ב <S%H8273><s%> neither shall the heat וָשָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> nor sun כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מְרַחֲמָ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> them for he that hath mercy יְנַהֲגֵ֔ם <S%H5090><s%> on them shall lead וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מַבּ֥וּעֵי <S%H4002><s%> them even by the springs מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water יְנַהֲלֵֽם׃ <S%H5095><s%> shall he guide

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <S%H7760><s%> And I will make כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרַ֖י <S%H2022><s%> all my mountains לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way וּמְסִלֹּתַ֖י <S%H4546><s%> and my highways יְרֻמֽוּן׃ <S%H7311><s%> shall be exalted

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מֵרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far יָבֹ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> Behold these shall come וְהִֽנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and lo אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these מִצָּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> and lo these from the north וּמִיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> and from the west וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and these from the land סִינִֽים׃ <S%H5515><s%> of Sinim

רָנּ֤וּ <S%H7442><s%> Sing שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> O heavens וְגִ֣ילִי <S%H1523><s%> and be joyful אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> O earth [יִפְצְחוּ כ] (וּפִצְח֥וּ <S%H6476><s%> break forth ק) הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> O mountains רִנָּ֑ה <S%H7440><s%> into singing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִחַ֤ם <S%H5162><s%> hath comforted יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וַעֲנִיָּ֖ו <S%H6041><s%> upon his afflicted יְרַחֵֽם׃ <S%H7355><s%> and will have mercy ס

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> But Zion עֲזָבַ֣נִי <S%H5800><s%> hath forsaken יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וַאדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> me and my Lord שְׁכֵחָֽנִי׃ <S%H7911><s%> hath forgotten

הֲתִשְׁכַּ֤ח <S%H7911><s%> forget אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> Can a woman עוּלָ֔הּ <S%H5764><s%> her sucking child מֵרַחֵ֖ם <S%H7355><s%> that she should not have compassion בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> on the son בִּטְנָ֑הּ <S%H990><s%> belly גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these תִשְׁכַּ֔חְנָה <S%H7911><s%> yet will I not forget וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶשְׁכָּחֵֽךְ׃ <S%H7911><s%> forget

הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כַּפַּ֖יִם <S%H3709><s%> thee upon the palms of [my] hands חַקֹּתִ֑יךְ <S%H2710><s%> Behold I have graven חוֹמֹתַ֥יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> thy walls נֶגְדִּ֖י <S%H5048><s%> before תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> [are] continually

מִֽהֲר֖וּ <S%H4116><s%> shall make haste בָּנָ֑יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> Thy children מְהָֽרְסַ֥יִךְ <S%H2040><s%> thy destroyers וּמַחֲרִבַ֖יִךְ <S%H2717><s%> and they that made thee waste מִמֵּ֥ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth

שְׂאִֽי־ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up סָבִ֤יב <S%H5439><s%> round about עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes וּרְאִ֔י <S%H7200><s%> and behold כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> All נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> all these gather themselves together בָֽאוּ־ <S%H935><s%> [and] come לָ֑ךְ חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> to thee [As] I live אָ֣נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> will surely כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> all כָּעֲדִ֣י <S%H5716><s%> thee with them all as with an ornament תִלְבָּ֔שִׁי <S%H3847><s%> thou shalt surely clothe וּֽתְקַשְּׁרִ֖ים <S%H7194><s%> and bind כַּכַּלָּֽה׃ <S%H3618><s%> them [on thee] as a bride

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For חָרְבֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2723><s%> For thy waste וְשֹׁ֣מְמֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H8074><s%> and thy desolate places וְאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land הֲרִֽסֻתֵ֑יךְ <S%H2035><s%> of thy destruction כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now תֵּצְרִ֣י <S%H3334><s%> shall even now be too narrow מִיּוֹשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> by reason of the inhabitants וְרָחֲק֖וּ <S%H7368><s%> shall be far away מְבַלְּעָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H1104><s%> and they that swallowed thee up

ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> will yet יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> the other shall say בְאָזְנַ֔יִךְ <S%H241><s%> again in thine ears בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The children שִׁכֻּלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7923><s%> which thou shalt have after thou hast lost צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> [is] too strait לִ֥י הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> The place גְּשָׁה־ <S%H5066><s%> for me give לִּ֥י וְאֵשֵֽׁבָה׃ <S%H3427><s%> to me that I may dwell

וְאָמַ֣רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> Then shalt thou say בִּלְבָבֵ֗ךְ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָֽלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> Who hath begotten לִי֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I שְׁכוּלָ֖ה <S%H7921><s%> me these seeing I have lost my children וְגַלְמוּדָ֑ה <S%H1565><s%> and am desolate גֹּלָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1473><s%> captive וְסוּרָ֗ה <S%H5493><s%> and removing to and fro וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who גִדֵּ֔ל <S%H1431><s%> ? and who hath brought up הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> behold אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <S%H7604><s%> these?
